meanings.definition: A male member of a religious order.
meanings.sent1: The frere spent his days praying in the monastery.
meanings.sent2: My frere is a monk who lives in the abbey.
meanings.sent3: The frere tried to teach the birds in the garden to sing hymns.
meanings.sent4: The frere's devotion to his faith was as unwavering as the stone walls of the church.
meanings.sent5: The frere's robe billowed in the wind as he walked towards the chapel.

meanings.sent1: My frere and I used to play in the fields together.
meanings.sent2: She has a younger frere who always looks up to her.
meanings.sent3: The frere borrowed my favorite book without asking, typical!
meanings.sent4: Their bond as freres was as strong as the roots of an ancient tree.
meanings.sent5: The frere always had a smile ready for his siblings, no matter the circumstance.
